title.rendered: The OVERSTUFFED SALE: 50% off at Gottwals Books!

content.rendered:
To say it simply… we have TOO MANY books!  After much deliberation, the Gottwals Books management team has decided to offer the FIRST EVER 50% OFF OVERSTUFFED Sale.  Our goal is to clear room on our shelves for MORE fresh inventory!  TAKE ADVANTAGE of this opportunity.  Plus, all Melissa & Doug items are 20% OFF through October 31st!

The 50% discount cannot be combined with any other discounts of store credit.  Save your credit for next time!  Enjoy the discount while it lasts!

50% OFF OVERSTUFFED Sale going on now through this Saturday, October 6th!
